title: 106: Taste of Persia
itunes:title: 106: Taste of Persia
itunes:subtitle: Naomi Duguid discovers the backstreet cooking of Armenia, Georgia and Iran; plus we learn a better way to make stew; Fuchsia Dunlop joins us live at Milk Street; The New Yorker's Adam Gopnik discusses ethical eating; and we take your calls with Sa...
description:
Naomi Duguid discovers the backstreet cooking of Armenia, Georgia and Iran; plus we learn a better way to make stew; Fuchsia Dunlop joins us live at Milk Street; The New Yorker’s Adam Gopnik discusses ethical eating; and we take your calls with Sara Moulton. (Originally aired 11/26/2016, Available for Re-run 3/2/17 – 3/9/17)

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
